TopicTitle: KER was my #1 mod for KSP. When the heck am I gonna be able to use it??

Articles.Content: The title says it all.  I don't know where else I would post this by the way, so I'm putting it here.  I'm really kinda stuck in KSP without it.  What's the deal with it?
I would say it's a bit off at times, but not broken- I still use it quite a bit, but I may be using features that didn't get affected by the update.
hmm, I'll try it again then.
Yeah, what's up with those modders having a life ?!?

Wait what ?

Is there a new version of KSP that breaks KER ? Mine works perfectly on 1.0.5
All I've seen are some empty values for jet engines in 1.0.5...  Install and see if it works for you
Indeed. Works fine for me in 1.0.5 except for empty values with jets in some cases.
